channel.title: Giant Alien -- BUG
channel.description:
I can't kill Giant Alien, in control panel I have two crosshairs and racket don't come to kill Alien.
[url=https://wstaw.org/w/1mgi/][img]https://wstaw.org/m/2012/09/18/2012-09-18_00016_jpg_300x300_q85.jpg[/img][/url]
ps: how can I kill him ??

item.title: Giant Alien -- BUG
item.dc:creator: mike
item.description:
I’m not sure that I understand you.
But I don’t used noclip.

Read full topic

item.title: Giant Alien -- BUG

item.description:
no you just noclip to the next area (through the area in the corner) or just hit the pylon and run like mad or does the pylon not fall over?

item.title: Giant Alien -- BUG
item.dc:creator: fuegerstef
item.description:
GamerMaster2041:

Worked for me.
He moves so its hard to hit him.

You better read the original post and understand what he is writing. The Garg moving is not the problem.

Sorry for making this comment, but if people don’t point out that some only post random stuff not that has nothing to do with the problem, they will never stop.

Read full topic
